item.description:
Lets all go to City Sports Grille at Spare Time Bowling For some Comedy.

Tickets are only $5. and $1 for the meetup (tickets are normally $10-$12. ~ but this comedy show will have a twist). At the beginning of the comedy show there will be 30-40 minutes of comics battling it out for the title of Maine's Funniest Comic...your vote counts!

Please arrive at 7:30pm so we can all meetup, sit together and have appetizers and drinks before the comedy show.

The Comedian headliner that will be performing is Jay Rodrigues.

Please read below on Jay Rodrigues

I hope to see you all there!!

Also, I will be hosting the comedy show!

Jay Rodrigues, a man who is as clever as he is funny. With more than 25 years experience Jay is a sure fire crowd pleaser. This experience gives Jay the ability to perform in some of the best clubs in the country. Jay's humor is wild and exciting without being offensive or vulgar, because of this he can work a senior citizen home during the day and a hip comedy club at night. Everybody loves Jay young and old alike. Even the toughest of customers can't help but bust out laughing while watching Jay work his magic on the audience.


ALL MEETUPS Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend an event to allow us to plan accordingly. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 5 "No Shows", you will no longer be able to attend meetup events.
item.name: Appetizers & Comedy Night - Sparetime Bowling Portland in the City Sports Grille
